fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
~ Missing Files (2-shot): Choose two players. The feedback they receive at the end of the night will be swapped.
~ Surreptitious Swap (1-shot): Choose two players. If one dies, their will and role will appear as the otherâ€™s.
~ Obstruction (0-shot): This ability gains 1 ammo on Night 3. Choose a role type- you will wipe all feedback they receive at the end of the night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: ~ All of your abilities are Astral.
